messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 2336
messages.msgSnippet: It s refreshing to hear christian homeschoolers on this list who have a more liberal view on things.  Sometimes I feel like there is only one type of
messages.messageBody:
It's refreshing to hear "christian" homeschoolers on this list who have a
more liberal view on things. Sometimes I feel like there is only one type
of christian...the fundamentalist type! My stomach turns when I hear about
some of the practices of fundamentalists - smacking their infants to teach
them to stay on the blanket, etc. There was an interesting article in the
lastest Homeschool Educator Magazine. The article was about how christian
homeschoolers are being targeted as abusive parents. I'm not so sure this
isn't true.

Linda Greene
